title: FS: T202 Cobb Desperate Slide PSA 2 $475
author: deltufjp2

posts.post_title: FS: T202 Cobb Desperate Slide PSA 2 $475
posts.post_content:
Very tough to find T202 Hassan Triple Folder O'Leary/Cobb "A Desperate Slide For Third" PSA 2. Very hard to find with nice color and registration. Center crease causes the PSA 2 grade. $[STRIKE]475 [/STRIKE] $450 PP gift.

[IMG]http://joedeltufo.com/t206/t202desperate_front.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://joedeltufo.com/t206/t202desperate_back.jpg[/IMG]
Final bump before Cobb goes to eBay.

I put this on eBay for anyone interested in bidding. 

[url]http://www.ebay.com/itm/1912-T202-Hassan-Triple-Folder-A-DESPERATE-SLIDE-FOR-THIRD-Ty-Cobb-PSA-2-/191240248625?pt=US_Baseball&hash=item2c86ce9d31[/url]
